metadata.name: Hope
metadata.description:
Optimistic people see the glass as half full and hopeful people ask how to fill the glass full.

Edition - 1/1 Photography NFT  
Artist - Sarah Lyndsay

About the Artist:

Sarah Lyndsay is a passionate, environmental self-portrait and landscape photographer based in the beautiful Canadian Rockies, widely known for her signature yellow dress, long exposure work and bubbly personality.  Sarah works with some of the photography industries top brands as an ambassador and travels the world educating other photographers in epic places.   She shares her experiences and behind-the- scenes on her YouTube channel and always has her Whippet, Ollie by her side on every adventure.  She has amassed a following of over 200,000 people through social media from years of dedication to her craft and plans to retire with a camera in her hand.

Extended Editorial License - Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
